pkgmetadata.longdescription:
# vs-denoise### VapourSynth denoising, regression, and motion-compensation functions
Wrappers for denoising, regression, and motion-compensation-related plugins and functions.You can find me in the [IEW Discord server](https://discord.gg/qxTxVJGtst), @Setsugennoao#6969.

## How to installInstall `vsdenoise` with the following command:```sh$ pip install vsdenoise```Or if you want the latest git version, install it with this command:```sh$ pip install git+https://github.com/Irrational-Encoding-Wizardry/vs-denoise.git```
